hero.description: Premium card: An army is not sufficient, he is ready obliterate, it is time for chaos.

cards.description: Standard card: Everything is sacred to him, all is but a gift from the saints.
cards.name: Disciple

cards.description: Premium card: No matter how many, his body will fight. Save your breath for the Mountain is strong.
cards.name: Goliath

cards.description: Standard card: Trained by the best, nothing will catch him off-guard.
cards.name: Sentinel

cards.description: Premium card: The will of Gods has been spoken, obey and you shall be saved...or not.
cards.name: Disciple

cards.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.
Premium card: The will of Gods has been spoken, obey and you shall be saved...or not.
cards.name: Disciple

cards.description: Premium card: Fear him. Your last breath is now.

cards.description: Premium card: Insanity is always an option, now it is an absolute.

cards.description: Premium card: Your mind is ours. Your body is ours. Stop begging.
